程序包 game.behaviours

类 ResurrectBehaviour

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
game.behaviours.ResurrectBehaviour
所有已实现的接口:
game.interfaces.Behaviour
public class ResurrectBehaviour
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action
implements game.interfaces.Behaviour
A class that figures out a MoveAction that will resurrect the skeleton(since the skeleton has the ability and behaviour)
